resources.string: The Learn WebTech has objective to teach the main current web technologies, with HTML 5, CSS 3, Bootstrap, JavaScript and JQuery. The application is in the form of a course with an initial content followed by a test in the form of a quiz question and answer.
Below is a summary of each technology that will be covered in the course.
